creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
markings: artist's label on BR verso of print: MARTINE GUTIERREZ / Mulan from ANTI-ICON: APOKALYPSIS, 2021 / C-print mounted on Dibond ...; Ryan Lee Gallery label BR verso of frame backing; Optium label TL verso frame; Laumont framing label BL verso frame
signed: verso BR, visible through door cut in frame backing: MG
text: From ballads to films, the figure of Mulan is known to many. In this photograph, Martine Gutierrez wishes to question who can play the role of Mulan. Gutierrez’s poses at the intersection of sculpture and human, adding another layer to Mulan’s place in the history of visual culture.
title: Mulan from ANTI-ICON: APOKALYPSIS
